description:
Generates compassionate, context-aware, and ethically safe responses to user messages about their emotional state. 
This tool analyzes the user's input and creates empathetic replies following therapeutic communication principles 
such as validation, reflection, and supportive encouragement. 
It does not provide diagnosis or medical advice and must escalate crisis or suicidal language to emergency help paths.
